verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--ke tumi, kāhāṅ tomāra ghara?
kṛṣṇadāsa kahe,--mui gṛhastha pāmara

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord inquired; ke tumi—who are you; kāhāṅ—where; tomāra—your; ghara—residence; kṛṣṇadāsa kahe—Kṛṣṇadāsa replied; mui—I; gṛhastha—householder; pāmara—most fallen.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu asked Kṛṣṇadāsa, "Who are you? Where is your home?" Kṛṣṇadāsa replied, "I am a most fallen householder.
